name: Crisilla
description: An elegant fairy cat with sparkling wings and a charming demeanor. Known for its critical strikes and ability to enchant enemies with irresistible charm.

ability.name: Charming Grace
ability.description: Critical hit ratio is doubled. Physical attacks have a 30% chance to infatuate the target.

moves.name: Moonbeam
moves.description: A beam of moonlight that may raise special attack.

moves.name: Charm
moves.description: Sharply lowers the target's attack and may cause infatuation.

moves.name: Swift
moves.description: Star-shaped rays that never miss. High critical hit ratio.

moves.name: Dazzling Gleam
moves.description: A powerful flash that damages and may confuse the target.
